title: PT Photo Editor 1.7.1 Standard [JUHAX69X]
description:
PT Photo Editor 1.7.1 Standard [JUHAX69X]
 
 
 
PT Photo Editor is an efficient application designed to solve all common photo problems, bring
your images to life and make them look their best. With PT Photo Editor, you can quickly correct
color casts, solve exposure problems, remove imperfections, enhance color tones, and turn
every photo into a work of art with your creativity.
  
PT Photo Editor is a reliable and handy piece of software that provides graphics editors with a
simple means of solving all common exposure problems and bringing out the colors in their
pictures using flexible color adjustment tools.
  
Thanks to its easy to use editing utilities, the user is able to crop and straighten pictures quickly,
enhance the colors of each photo, modify the saturation, contrast and brightness effects, as well
as remove unwanted distractions from each image.
  
The main window of the application is very simple and user-friendly from where you can drag
and drop any picture you want. The bottom line displays a convenient image browsing that
makes the work process more smoother.
 
 
 
What's New:
 
- Full-time 16-bit editing. Supports opening & saving as 8/16-bit image.
- Supports specifying color profile(ICC) when saving. Add auto-white-balance and auto-levels.
- Add "Clarity", "Split Toning" and "Vignetting" adjustments.
- Improve algorithms for "White Balance", "Exposure", "Blemish Tool" and feather.
- "Brush Tool" supports auto-masking. Add "Heal" mode for "Clone Tool".
- Add shotcuts for creating, feather and renaming a region. Shortcuts List. Bug fixing.
 
 
Remember to check "Read Me" -file.
 
 

If You like this upload, please share it with others by seeding. Thank You.
